sourcesContent:
import {cartInfo} from "../../data/cart"; import "./cart.css"; const Cart =()=>{ const TotalPrice=cartInfo.reduce((acc,cur)=> acc+cur.price*cur.quantity , 0) return(
Your Shopping Cart
{cartInfo.map(item=>
Title:{item.title}
Author:{item.author}
{item.quantity}
${item.price*item.quantity}
)}
ORDER SUMMARY
Subtotal {/* 0 is the initial value of acc , reduce loop over all the array class 16 */} ${}
Shopping Cost 0
Discount 0
Total {/* 0 is the initial value of acc , reduce loop over all the array */} ${}
); } export default Cart;
